com.blockhaus2000.plugin

Interface IpmPluginClassLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleIpmPluginClassLoader

    public interface IpmPluginClassLoader
    This class loader is used to provide class usage through plugins/jars.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)
      Will call findClass(String, boolean) with global = true.
      java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name, boolean global)
      Searchs for the given (full-qualified) class name.

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name,
                           boolean global)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Searchs for the given (full-qualified) class name. If global == true, this will search in all registered plugins.
        Parameters:
        name - The full-qualified name of the class to search for.
        global - A bollean that indicates that the IpmPluginLoader has to search for the given class in all registered plugins.
        Returns:
        The class, if found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Will be thrown if the class could not be find.

      • findClass

        java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Will call findClass(String, boolean) with global = true.
        Parameters:
        name - The full-qualified name of the class to search for.
        Returns:
        The class, if found
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Will be thrown if the class could not be find.
